channel.title: OpenGL on Zade Gueble
channel.description: Recent content in OpenGL on Zade Gueble

item.title: Ray-Tracer
item.description: When my computer was stolen back in early 2016, I lost almost all of my files from the days of my undergraduate studies. It wasn’t until recently, with all of time I’ve spent familiarizing myself with OpenGL, that I decided to attempt to reconstruct my years-old Computer Graphics project. The original application ran on a 32-bit Linux VM, so I knew that it would take a little bit of tinkering to compile and run on my machine.
